LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
literally: road; hence: = a space between walls ► serving to connect two different points in a building
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
literally: road; hence: = a journey made for a specific purpose, usually on someone else’s behalf
literally: way; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: way; hence: = pattern of behavior that is part of what defines the nature of humans and animals, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: way; hence: = a location that needs to be passed to get from one place to another
literally: way; hence: = the space between two places
literally: road; hence: = a point to or from which a person or thing moves or faces, ◄ understood as the road between that person or thing and the point in focus
= road ◄ leading through Transjordan along the desert border, connecting Damascus with the Gulf of Aqabah
